Application:Target:Operating System Property

Short Name: App.TargetOS

Requires: Base Development System

Class: Application Properties

To Use: Create a property.

Indicates the operating system for which the application was built. Mac OS refers to Mac OS versions 9 and 8. Carbon refers to Mac OS X (32-bit).

The LabVIEW Real-Time Module always returns Phar Lap or VxWorks.

Values

0invalid OS target
1Mac OS
2Windows 3.1
3Windows 95/NT
4Solaris 1
5Solaris 2
6HP-UX
7PowerMAX
8Linux
9Irix
10Rhapsody
11BeOS
12AIX
13OSF1
14VxWorks
15PharLap
16Carbon
17RTX
18Windows x64
19Linux x64
20Mac OS X x64

Remarks

The following table lists the characteristics of this property.

Data type
PermissionsRead Only
Available in Run-Time EngineYes (Read Only)
Available in Real-Time Operating SystemYes
Remote access allowedYes
